title: [L2M] - Order Placement - New Business
description:
Description
https://wiki.telekom.de/display/MBFY/O3+-+MAPI
Ths overall scope for this feature is to further process the o3 partial orders created by the MAPI decomposer and patched by EOS in order to have them as orders in CRM-T.
This results in the following steps to be performed:
create / adapt the Camunda workflow for MAPI orders
create temporary CDP-ids for relatedParties
transform the O3 partial order into the MAPI-POM order structure
submit the tansformed order towards MAPI-POM
incorporate information provided by the MAPI-POM into the o3 partial order.
listen to updates on the MAPI-POM-order and incorporate those updates into the O3 partial order
send out events (partialORderStateChangeEvent and attributeValueChangeEvent) when the O3 partial orders changes
